snippet: Nobody quite knows why, but Beijing has launched apparent antitrust investigations against Microsoft and others.
abstract: Editorial observes China has opened what appear to be politically motivated antitrust investigations into American tech companies like Microsoft and Qualcomm, but nobody knows quite why; contends American businesses should recognize that doing business in China, while potentially lucrative, is bound to be difficult and fraught.
lead_paragraph: Nobody quite knows why, but Beijing has launched apparent antitrust investigations against Microsoft and others.
